sections.title: Features
items: Live Activity & Download Queue - Track downloads from Lock Screen and queue multiple episodes (#39 by @SimSalabimse)
Download Speed & Time Estimates - Real-time speed, remaining size, and ETA (#38 by @SimSalabimse)
Offline Playback Detection - Prompts to play downloaded version when available (#26 by @SimSalabimse)
Storage Size Display - See total download storage usage (#18 by @SimSalabimse)
Download Progress Display - Progress bars in Downloads tab (#16 by @SimSalabimse)

sections.title: Fixes
items: App Lag During Downloads - Fixed lag throughout the app when downloading (#15 by @SimSalabimse)
Cancel Download Button - X button now works properly on downloading episodes
